text: Hamcunin ʙedorason kardem, to ʙo jakdigar guftugu kunand. Jake az onho pursid: «Cand vaqt ast, ki oromidaed?» Guftand: «Jak ruz jo nime az ruz oromidaem». Guftand: «Parvardigoraton ʙehtar donad, ki cand vaqt oromidaed. Jakero az xud ʙo in pulaton ʙa sahr ʙifiristed, to ʙingarad, ki ƣizoi pokiza kadom ast va az on ʙarojaton ruzijatonro ʙijovarad. Va ʙojad ki ʙo husjori (ehtijot) raftor kunad, to kase ʙa sumo ogohi najoʙad
